subject: Economics
title: The Belt and Road: China's New Silk Road
description: One-minute skill: The Belt and Road: China's New Silk Road.

hook.text: China is spending $1 trillion building ports, railways, and highways across 140 countries.

buildup.text: The Belt and Road Initiative connects Asia, Africa, and Europe through Chinese-funded infrastructure.

discovery.text: Sri Lanka couldn't repay a Chinese port loan and signed a 99-year lease.

twist.text: But many BRI projects genuinely fill infrastructure gaps.

climax.text: The BRI is simultaneously generosity and strategy.

punchline.text: Who builds the roads decides where they lead.

quiz.question: What criticism has been leveled at China's Belt and Road Initiative?
options: Loans can create debt traps where countries surrender strategic assets when they can't repay
